PackagePath

optDefiningTable 
 public Scope optDefiningTable(String name)
get 
 public Object get(String name) throws UndefinedVariableException
get 
 public Object get(String name,
                   Object instead)
readOnly 
 public Scope readOnly()
Returns the Scope stone-cast to give only a read-only view. If this Scope is already read-only, just return it.

sprout 
 public ScopeEditor sprout()
Makes and returns a new ScopeEditor that inherits from this Scope. This new Scope starts with an empty set of locals.

sprout 
 public ScopeEditor sprout(boolean redefOK)
Makes and returns a new ScopeEditor that inherits from this Scope. Since PackagePaths do not permit user definitions to be added, we just do a standard sprout.

extend 
 public ScopeEditor extend(String names[],
                           Object values[]) throws ArityMismatchException, AlreadyDefinedException
Like sprout, but also defines in the result each pair of a name and a value. The names and values arrays must have the same arity.

mapping 
 public Mapping mapping()
A snapshot of the name-to-value mapping represented by this Scope. This is composed through the inheritance chain, with a child's association occluding a parent's association for the same name.

bindings 
 public String bindings()
standardScope 
 public static ScopeEditor standardScope(boolean redefOK,
                                         IndentWriter stdout)
